documents.document: One day you'll find someone who doesn't care about your past because they want to be your future.
Just because you're in a relationship, doesn't mean you have to post a status about that person every minutes.
Love is when you close your eyes, and he's all you see, and when you open them, he's all you want to see.
How would you know if he really loves you? It's when you cry, he hugs you.
The person who has truly loved you is the only one who has the strength to accept your mistakes and forgive you.
God puts people in your life for a reason, and removes them from your life for a better reason.
There are no mistakes on life, only lessons.
Do not give hope to someone, if in the end you gave up on them.
When u try to change people, they usually remain the same. But when you don't try to change people, they change in the most beautiful way.
Should I remove my brain to stop thinking about you? Or should I remove my heart so I can stop loving you?
You don't need to have a fairy tale story to get your 'happily-ever-after.' You just need to be happy with the life you lead.
No matter the distance, no matter the time, I will be there by your side. Even when the world may be ending, I shall be there.
If one day you into my heart, you'll cry, because there is full of you. If one day I went into your (cont) http://t.co/GAXEyFyH
I just wanna be the only girl you love all your life.
A beautiful woman wouldn't compare herself with others. She's proud & happy being herself, & that makes her incomparable.
I am someone else when I am with you, someone more like myself.
I believe that God wants us to meet a few wrong people, so that when we finally meet the right one, we will know to be grateful.
Love actually is all around us.
Don't always be super nice to someone. Sometimes you have to show your bad side to know who can accept you at your worst.
One of the happiest things on the earth is when you know you are in love with someone who loves you more.
A man's biggest mistake is giving another man the opportunity to make his woman smile.
I just couldn't live in a world where you don't exist.
When I'm alone, music is the perfect best friend to be with.
I'm afraid I'm not good enough for you.
You need to have a bad day every once in a while. Otherwise, you'll never know what a good day feels like.
Sometimes it's easier to pretend you don't care than to admit that it's killing you.
Be yourself. There's no one better at it in the entire world.
Don't love someone because they're great. Love someone because they make you feel great & you two are great together.
Dear God, I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart for never leaving me, and always being here for me.
Sometimes all you need in the end is someone who will hold you and say everything is alright...
Love isn't enough to keep the relationship going. It takes a lot of effort and patience to make the commitment stronger.
Always remember that, no matter how useless you feel, you're someone's reason to smile.
Pretending to be happy when you're in pain is just an example of how strong you are as a person.
If someone sticks by your side through your bad times, they deserve to be with you through your good times.
I'm blasting my music so I won't hear my thoughts, but the lyrics just remind me of what I'm trying to forget.
Love is something which can't be expressed in words, but can be felt by anyone in the universe.
God speaks to those who take time to listen and God listens to those who take time to pray.
What ever God does, is not for us to understand, but to accept and believe that His way is always for the BEST.
I don't understand why destiny allowed some people to meet, when there's no way for them to be together.
Never give up on love. Love is unpredictable and you'll be surprised how much love can make you smile.
Sometimes, I wonder why I love you, just trying to find it out and then the next day I see you... how love doesn't need a reason.
From the good things I've learned to be a thankful person. From the trials I've learned to be a strong person.
A love like ours isn't common, we treat each other with respect and we remain loyal because we only want to be with each other.
When you look into someone's eyes and you feel something indescribable, that's when you know it's real. And you shouldn't let it go.
I will never be good enough for everybody. But I am best for someone who really appreciates me.
You don't need to be perfect, you just need to be yourself, because I love you for who you are, just the way you are.
#TipsToHappyLife Accept the things u cant change, move on and let go of anything that's holding u down, and always thank God for everything!
Being a gentlemen won't get you all the women, but if you're a true gentlemen, you only want one woman anyway.
You can't imagine how much I miss you.
You can't silence your enemies with words, but you can silence them with actions.
You can't completely control your life, but you can still make the right choice to make it easier.
When a guy is away from his girl, all he wants is her trust. But on the girl's part, all she needs is his loyalty.
A negative thinker makes everything worse, heavier, & harder. A positive thinker makes everything better, lighter, & easier.
I miss you, not the "I haven't seen you in a while" kind of miss you, but the "I wish you were here at this very moment" kind of miss you.
Don't give up just because of what someone said. Use that as motivation push harder.
Jangan ragu untuk berdoa, bahkan ketika kamu tak menemukan kata untuk dipanjatkan, karena Tuhan selalu mengerti doamu. God is Awesome.
RT @AstrologySecret: 1000 followers（Ｔ▽Ｔ）。 (≧≦) 谢谢大家!!
I love you more today than yesterday, but not as much as tomorrow.
What hurts you today, makes you stronger tomorrow.
Don't marry a man unless you'd be proud to have a son exactly like him.
Two people are connected at heart, it doesn't matter what you do, there are no boundaries or barriers if they are destined to be together.
If God gives u a "tomorrow", thank Him, because every tomorrow is a new chance to make a difference & turn things around.
There's nothing like your best friends! Keep your circle small and cherish your friends forever!
The most difficult phase of life is not when no one understands you, it is when you don't understand yourself.
Don't let a bad day make you feel like you have a bad life.
When I first met you, I honestly don't plan on falling in love.
My heart beats a little faster whenever I see you.
Don't always look for happiness, sometimes you may just have to create it.
When you think life is too hard, remind yourself that it won't last forever. After all, life's only temporary.
Everytime I think of you, I get the biggest smile on my face and you still don't understand how much you mean to me.
Please follow my other accounts in Chinese @aiqingfenxiang & @AstrologySecret. Thank you (^-^)ノ~~
I would stay up all night just to talk to you.
People will always talk about you, especially when they envy you and the life you live.
I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
The hardest thing ever is watching the person you love loving someone else & then trying to act happy, even though you're dying inside.
No matter how hard things may seem, there is always something good coming around the corner.
Dear God, I've tried my best, but if today I lose my hope, please tell me that Ur plans are better than my dreams.
I know it may seem like the hardest thing to do, but you have to forget about the boy who forgot about you.
Be with someone who knows exactly what they have when they have you. Not someone who realizes it after they've lost you.
You're the best I have ever have. I can't tell you how much you have change the way I view about life.
Don't give up just because of what people said. Use that as your motivation to push harder.
You knew me better than I knew myself. You loved me like nobody else.
Our small, stupid conversations mean so much more to me than you'll ever know.
There's things in life you have to let go of no matter how much it hurts because, you know it's for the best.
No one is perfect, but with the right person... you've got a perfect match.
There is no one busy in this world, it's always about priorities. You will always find time for the things you feel important.
When a girl is in love, you can see it in her smile. When a guy is in love, you can see it in his eyes.
Believing in God doesn't mean I will never fall, it just means I trust that He will catch me when I do.
If I end up being the one walking away, I want you to know that it wasn't because I stopped loving you, but because you stopped loving me.
He is all I need, He is always there, He is my everything, He is GOD.
I still like you, I'm just tired of trying.
I hate that feeling. The feeling when you're sad and you have no idea why, but you just are.
Missing someone is your heart's way of reminding you that you love them.
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
Let's turn our mistakes into lessons, and our fears into hopes. We should have faith in God and be strong.
F.R.I.E.N.D.S: (F)ight for you. (R)espect you. (I)nvolve you. (E)ncourage you. (N)eed you. (D)eserve you. (S)ave you.
The person who really LOVES u sees what a mess u can be, how moody u can get, how hard u are to handle, but still wants u in their life.
Love doesn't need to be perfect. It just needs to be true.
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
Isn't it ironic? We ignore the ones that adore us. Adore the ones who ignore us. Love the ones who hurt us. Hurt the ones that love us.
